about_the_game:
Grab some friends and clap your cheeks together as you spank booty through various chaotic party modes, striving to become the Spanky Champion!

The aim of the game is simple! Slap ass!

Jiggle and bounce through endlessly generated party games, where each mode offers a unique challenge for you to conquer. Combine powers with insane booty-based movement to unleash powerful spanks that keep every game one of a kind!

Movement you love & new tech to master!

Spanky! offers high skill-ceiling movement that allows you to hone your skills and demolish your opponent's cheeks. Master the art of booty schmovement as you run, climb, and spank your way through any booty that stands in your way!

Earn Booty Loot every play session!

Unlock hundreds of unique customisation options! Every base cosmetic is available for you to unlock through fun and rewarding gameplay, right from the start! Level up, unlock achievements, and find secrets - all of which grant rewards!

Our famous scientist Albooty Heinstein just did the math, and turns out that with every cosmetic option available there are ~50,848,869,120 possible combinations...

Key features

  • 300+ FREE cosmetics to unlock through gameplay!
  • Insanely unique booty powers to master. Slap ass with the Aimbutt, or run faster than lightning with a Bum Buff!
  • Easy to handle movement with extreme speed and a high skill-ceiling
  • 20+ base maps - More added with each update!
  • Champion mode! Play back-to-back games earning points for performance and placement, the winner grabs the cheek crown first!
  • Quick games! Hop-in Hop-out, randomly generated & player-voted single games for fast action.
  • Custom lobbies! Host lobbies for you and your friends adjusting custom settings - with more customization options in future updates!
  • Optional in-game voice chat and auto lip-syncing
  • Optional in-game booty censor for family-friendly content! You can still slap ass, just no cracks!

Spanky! is a light-hearted multiplayer experience with humorous elements, including characters with jiggly butt physics. Have a blast, and always play responsibly and respectfully.

About the Game

Grab some friends and clap your cheeks together as you spank booty through various chaotic party modes, striving to become the Spanky Champion!

The aim of the game is simple! Slap ass!

Movement you love & new tech to master!

Spanky! offers high skill-ceiling movement that allows you to hone your skills and demolish your opponent's cheeks. Master the art of booty schmovement as you run, climb, and spank your way through any booty that stands in your way!

Earn Booty Loot every play session!

Unlock hundreds of unique customisation options! Every base cosmetic is available for you to unlock through fun and rewarding gameplay, right from the start! Level up, unlock achievements, and find secrets - all of which grant rewards!

Our famous scientist Albooty Heinstein just did the math, and turns out that with every cosmetic option available there are ~50,848,869,120 possible combinations...

  • Optional in-game voice chat and auto lip-syncing

name: Spanky!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win64
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD Ryzen Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“This is, without a doubt, the best Aussie party game since Moving Out.”
Kotaku

“The brainchild of Melbourne developers/geniuses, Rory Hulme and Blake Kolodziej”
Press Start
short_description: Spanky! is THE booty-physics party game that brings cheeky movement mechanics to chaos-filled party modes. Twerk online with up to 7 friends and slap some jiggly tush!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
